solution.text:
Length of reservoir \(=_{j}_\)m
Width of reservoir \(=_{k}_\)m
Depth of reservoir \(=_{l}_\)m
Volume of reservoir \(=_{j}_m \times _{k}_m \times _{l}_m\)
\(=_{{j*k*l}}_\,m^3\)
\(=_{{j*k*l*1000}}_\,litres\)

content.text:
A cuboidal water storage reservoir is \(_{j}_\)m long, \(_{k}_\)m wide and \(_{l}_\)m deep.
How many litres of water can it store?
